data.question: What are the three new MOF materials synthesized in this work based on porphyrin and organotin moieties?
data.answer: The three new MOF materials synthesized in this work based on porphyrin and organotin moieties are SnTCPP-SQL, SnTCPP-PTS, and SnTCPP-SHE.

data.question: What is the role played by the organic part of organotin in these MOFs?
data.answer: The organic part of organotin protects the coordination bond from attack by water molecules, imparting hydrophobicity and water stability to the MOFs.

data.question: What are the topological networks of SnTCPP-SQL, SnTCPP-PTS and SnTCPP-SHE?
data.answer: SnTCPP-SQL has a 2D (4,4)-connected sql net, SnTCPP-PTS has a 3D (4,4)-connected pts net, and SnTCPP-SHE has a (4,6)-connected she net.

data.question: What is the water contact angle and chemical stability of SnTCPP-PTS?
data.answer: SnTCPP-PTS exhibited exceptional superhydrophobicity with a water contact angle of 170掳 and high chemical stability in an aqueous solution at pH ranging from 1 to 13.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of SnTCPP-SHE and how does it compare to other hydrophobic frameworks?
data.answer: SnTCPP-SHE has a BET surface area of 3940 m2 g鈭?, which is one of the highest among all reported hydrophobic frameworks.

data.question: How was a hydrophobic and functional fabric prepared using SnTCPP-PTS?
data.answer: A hydrophobic and functional fabric was prepared by coating nanoscale crystallites of SnTCPP-PTS on a hydrophilic-lipophilic fabric using an ethanol dispersion. This changed the fabric from hydrophilic to superhydrophobic.

data.question: What is the oil-water separation capability of the SnTCPP-PTS coated fabrics?
data.answer: The SnTCPP-PTS coated fabrics have highly efficient oil-water separation capability, with separation efficiencies > 99% for various organic solvents and oils like dichloromethane and gasoline from water.

data.question: Why does the organic part of organotin make the MOFs hydrophobic?
data.answer: The organic part like methyl, butyl groups in the organotin SBUs point into the pores and channels of the MOFs, creating a hydrophobic pore environment that repels water. This makes the internal surface of the MOFs hydrophobic.

data.question: How does the length of the organic group in organotin affect the hydrophobicity of the MOFs?
data.answer: As the length of the organic group like methyl to butyl increases from SnTCPP-SQL to SnTCPP-PTS and SnTCPP-SHE, the water contact angle increases from 82掳 to 170掳 and 165掳 respectively. This indicates increasing hydrophobicity with longer organic chains in the organotin SBUs.

data.question: What makes SnTCPP-PTS a good candidate for oil-water separation applications?
data.answer: SnTCPP-PTS has a combination of high porosity to absorb oils, superhydrophobicity to repel water, excellent chemical stability in a wide pH range, and nanoscale morphology allowing it to be easily coated on fabrics. These attributes make it very useful for efficient oil-water separation.

data.question: True or False: SnTCPP-SQL exhibits higher chemical stability than SnTCPP-PTS.
data.answer: False. SnTCPP-SQL, protected by methyltin, has lower chemical stability (pH 4-11) compared to SnTCPP-PTS which is stable in pH 1-13.

data.question: True or False: The SnTCPP-PTS coated fabric allows water to pass through but not organic solvents during oil-water separation.
data.answer: False. The superhydrophobic SnTCPP-PTS coated fabric repels water but allows organic solvents and oils to pass through during the separation process.

data.question: True or False: SnTCPP-SHE has a higher BET surface area than SnTCPP-PTS.
data.answer: True. SnTCPP-SHE has a very high BET surface area of 3940 m2/g, much higher than SnTCPP-PTS which has a BET surface area of only 211 m2/g.

data.question: True or False: This is the first reported example of porphyrinic MOFs based on tin metal.
data.answer: True. As stated in the conclusion, this is the first reported example of porphyrinic MOFs based on tin metal.

data.question: True or False: The SnTCPP-PTS coated fabric loses its oil-water separation efficiency after multiple cycles of use.
data.answer: False. The SnTCPP-PTS coated fabric shows excellent recycling performance, maintaining separation efficiency >99% even after five cycles, demonstrating its good stability.

data.question: True or False: SnTCPP-PTS exhibits structural flexibility similar to MIL-53.
data.answer: True. The two-step CO2-trap isotherm at 195 K and the reversible shifting of PXRD peaks with temperature indicate structural flexibility of SnTCPP-PTS, similar to MIL-53.

data.question: True or False: The SnTCPP-PTS coated fabric exhibits self-cleaning properties in addition to oil-water separation.
data.answer: True. Due to its hydrophobic properties, the SnTCPP-PTS coated fabric exhibits a self-cleaning function, allowing easy removal of dust particles from its surface.
